data.title: Poison Cloud Lurk for Mail From A Main
data.description: Throw this orb lineup to pressure Defenders at Art, as it threatens and isolates the A Site player from the Art player.

data.title: A Site Execute Wall for Art + Orb for Dug Out
data.description: Enable your team to successfully take A Site with this combination of Viper utility, you can choose to position your wall closer or further away to the site.

data.title: B Heaven Poison Cloud Execute From Shops
data.description: Here's a powerful lineup you can use to enhance your B Site execute, Defenders cannot peek through the orb.

data.title: B Site Default Post Plant Snakebite from B Ramp
data.description: Here's a great post plant Snakebite lineup from B Ramp.
